data.name: Dungeon Overseer - Platinum Donation
data.detailed_description: If you enjoyed playing Dungeon Overseer and would like to support future projects and development you can purchase this DLC.  This DLC is for donation purposes only and adds nothing extra to Dungeon Overseer.
data.about_the_game: If you enjoyed playing Dungeon Overseer and would like to support future projects and development you can purchase this DLC.  This DLC is for donation purposes only and adds nothing extra to Dungeon Overseer.
data.short_description: If you enjoyed playing Dungeon Overseer and would like to support future projects and development you can purchase this DLC. This DLC is for donation purposes only and adds nothing extra to Dungeon Overseer.
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Japanese, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Win 7+
  • Processor: 2.0 ghz or higher
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
